title: Just what you wanted! A great 1 bed, 1 bath in Las Vegas
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Avanti Apartments!', 'Located at:', '10697 W Centennial Pky', 'Las Vegas, NV 89166', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 1', '# of Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 849 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1436 - $1671/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Close enough to the fabulous fanfare of Vegas, yet separate from the hustle-bustle, Avanti Apartments have the ideal balance of city excitement and the serenity that comes from being close to nature.', 'Offering newly renovated apartment homes!', '$0 deposit required OAC', 'Community Features:', '✓ BBQ/Picnic Area', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Fitness Center with Free Weights', '✓ Lounge', '✓ Online Payments Available', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Private Cabanas', '✓ Resident Clubhouse and TV Lounge', '✓ Spa', '✓ Electric Car Charging Stations', '✓ Green Globes Certified', '✓ Night Patrol', '✓ No Security Deposit Required OAC', '✓ Resident Coffee Bar', '✓ Self-Guided Tours', '✓ Smoke-Free Community', '✓ Sparkling Pool/Spa with Large Sundeck', 'Unit Features:', '✓ Breakfast Bar', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Crown Molding', '✓ Double Pane Windows', '✓ Microwave', '✓ Oversized Bathtubs', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ Range', '✓ Stainless Steel Appliances', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Bay Windows', 'In Select Homes', '✓ Breakfast Bars In Select Homes', '✓ Built-In Linen Storage', '✓ Built-in Microwave', '✓ Frost Free Refrigerator with Ice Maker', '✓ Large Vanities and Relaxing Garden Tubs', '✓ Multi-Cycle Dishwasher', '✓ Newly Renovated Homes', '✓ Preinstalled Wi-Fi with 1st Month Free from COX', '✓ Stackable Washer and Dryer', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat - Sun: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Avanti Apartments is a pet-friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', 'Monthly pet rent is $30/month for one pet, $50/month for two pets.', '$200 refundable deposit for one pet, and $300 for the second pet refundable deposit.', 'For completed breed restrictions please contact our leasing team.', 'Leasing Options:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Management:', 'Security Properties', 'Availability and pricing are subject to change without notice.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'SPRCL13', '768C3BEB49324E3']
